fields.description:
As a cloud user, I would like AWS compatible experience when interacting with ELB on Eucalyptus VPC instances - http://docs.aws.amazon.com/ElasticLoadBalancing/latest/DeveloperGuide/elb-internal-load-balancers.html

Able to run internal load balancer that does not have public access in any way.

comments.body:
[~nurmi]/[~viglesias]:

Confirmed with [~lwade], this diagram provides some insight as to what customers have been asking for:

http://docs.aws.amazon.com/ElasticLoadBalancing/latest/DeveloperGuide/vpc-loadbalancer-types.html

Is this scheduled for 4.3 release? I have several tenants asking for this capability.  Many were expecting this with VPC being officially added in 4.2.

Thanks.
[~jgallucci32] Yes it is currently being worked on with targeted release in 4.3.

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.3.0-0.25026.353.20160711git783d0ca.el7}}

*Testing Environment YAML*

{code}
default_attributes:
  eucalyptus:
    default-img-url: http://images.objectstorage.cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/precise-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.img
    dns:
      domain: a-27.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
    enterprise-repo: http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/yum/tags/enterprise-devel/centos/7/x86_64/
    euca2ools-repo: http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/yum/tags/euca2ools-devel/centos/7/x86_64/
    eucalyptus-repo: http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/yum/tags/eucalyptus-devel/centos/7/x86_64/
    imaging-vm-type: m1.medium
    init-script-url: http://git.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/qa-repos/eucalele/raw/master/deploy-helpers/scripts/network-interfaces.sh
    install-service-image: 'true'
    install-type: packages
    nc:
      max-cores: 32
    network:
      bridge-interface: br0
      bridged-nic: em1
      config-json:
        InstanceDnsServers: &id001
        - 10.111.5.69
        Mido:
          EucanetdHost: g-05-06.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
          GatewayHost: g-08-07.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
          GatewayIP: 10.116.133.149
          GatewayInterface: em1.116
          PublicGatewayIP: 10.116.133.173
          PublicNetworkCidr: 10.116.128.0/17
        Mode: VPCMIDO
        PublicIps:
        - 10.116.154.0-10.116.154.254
      dns-server: 10.111.5.69
      mode: VPCMIDO
      private-interface: br0
      public-interface: br0
    source-branch: master
    source-repo: ssh://repo-euca@git.eucalyptus-systems.com/internal
    system-properties:
      black-dollar.storage.chapuser: hspencer-4519
      black-dollar.storage.ncpaths: 10.107.2.1
      black-dollar.storage.sanhost: 10.109.2.1
      black-dollar.storage.sanpassword: zoomzoom
      black-dollar.storage.sanuser: root
      black-dollar.storage.scpaths: 10.107.2.1
      cloud.euca_log_level: DEBUG
      cloudformation.url_domain_whitelist: '*s3.amazonaws.com, git.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com'
    topology:
      cassandra: 10.111.5.149
      clc-1: 10.111.1.178
      clusters:
        black-dollar:
          cc-1: 10.111.1.134
          nodes: 10.111.5.70
          sc-1: 10.111.1.134
          storage-backend: netapp
      riakcs:
        access-key: ''
        admin-email: hspencer-4519@euca-qa.com
        admin-name: hspencer-4519
        endpoint: 10.111.1.177
        port: 80
        secret-key: ''
      user-facing: *id001
      zookeeper: 10.111.5.149
    yum-options: --nogpg
  midokura:
    bgp-peers:
    - local-as: 65936
      peer-address: 10.116.133.173
      port-ip: 10.116.133.149
      remote-as: 65000
      route: 10.116.154.0/24
      router-name: eucart
    cassandras:
    - 10.111.5.149
    initial-tenant: euca_tenant_1
    midolman-host-mapping:
      a-28.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com: 10.111.5.70
      g-05-06.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com: 10.111.1.178
      g-08-07.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com: 10.111.5.149
    repo-password: 8yU8Pj6h
    repo-url: http://mirror.eucalyptus-systems.com/midokura/repo/v1.9/stable/RHEL/7/
    repo-username: eucalyptus
    yum-options: --nogpg
    zookeepers:
    - 10.111.5.149:2181
description: Eucalyptus CI Testing
name: hspencer-4519
{code}

*Testing Steps*

# Used following Cloudformation template to create an internal ELB on VPC cloud:
{code}
{
  "AWSTemplateFormatVersion" : "2010-09-09",

  "Description" : "Elastic Load Balancing Test => MVP test for internal AWS::ElasticLoadBalancing::LoadBalancer resource on VPC",

  "Resources" : {
     "VPC": {
        "Type": "AWS::EC2::VPC",
        "Properties" : {
            "CidrBlock" : "10.0.0.0/16",
            "EnableDnsSupport" : "True",
            "EnableDnsHostnames" : "True",
            "Tags" : [ {"Key" : "Application", "Value" : { "Ref" : "AWS::StackId"}} ]
        }
    },

    "Subnet": {
        "Type" : "AWS::EC2::Subnet",
        "Properties" : {
            "VpcId" : { "Ref" : "VPC" },
            "CidrBlock" : "10.0.0.0/24",
            "Tags" : [ {"Key" : "Application", "Value" : { "Ref" : "AWS::StackId"} } ]
        }
    },

    "LoadBalancer" : {
      "Type" : "AWS::ElasticLoadBalancing::LoadBalancer",
      "Properties" : {
          "Subnets" : [{ "Ref" : "Subnet" }],
          "Scheme" : "internal",
          "Listeners" : [ {
              "LoadBalancerPort" : "80",
              "InstancePort" : "80",
              "Protocol" : "HTTP"
          } ]
      }
    }
  },

  "Outputs" : {
      "LoadBalancerId" : {
          "Description" : "Resource ID of LoadBalancer",
          "Value" : { "Ref" : "LoadBalancer" }
      },

      "LoadBalancerDNSName" : {
          "Description" : "DNS Name of LoadBalancer",
          "Value" : { "Fn::GetAtt" : [ "LoadBalancer", "DNSName" ] }
      },

      "LoadBalancerSecurityGroupName" : {
          "Description" : "Security Group Name of LoadBalancer",
          "Value" : { "Fn::GetAtt" : [ "LoadBalancer", "SourceSecurityGroup.GroupName" ] }
      },

      "LoadBalancerSecurityGroupOwnerAlias" : {
          "Description" : "Group Owner Alias of LoadBalancer",
          "Value" : { "Fn::GetAtt" : [ "LoadBalancer", "SourceSecurityGroup.OwnerAlias" ] }
      }
  }

}
{code}
# Confirmed stack deployed successfully
{code}
[root@g-05-06 ~]# euform-create-stack DBInternalELB --template-file cfn-internal-elb-test.json --region devops-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000441287616:stack/DBInternalELB/ff0d4c4a-d4cd-42e1-bce8-1fb33c33a70b
[root@g-05-06 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region devops-admin@
STACK	DBInternalELB	CREATE_COMPLETE		Elastic Load Balancing Test => MVP test for internal AWS::ElasticLoadBalancing::LoadBalancer resource on VPC	2016-07-13T05:01:54.609Z
OUTPUT	LoadBalancerId	DBIntern-LoadBalan-LX4OBPVWGWNHS
OUTPUT	LoadBalancerDNSName	internal-DBIntern-LoadBalan-LX4OBPVWGWNHS-000441287616.lb.a-27.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
OUTPUT	LoadBalancerSecurityGroupName	default
OUTPUT	LoadBalancerSecurityGroupOwnerAlias	000441287616
{code}
# Confirmed ELB deployed:
{code}
[root@g-05-06 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs --show-long --region devops-admin@
LOAD_BALANCER	DBIntern-LoadBalan-LX4OBPVWGWNHS	internal-DBIntern-LoadBalan-LX4OBPVWGWNHS-000441287616.lb.a-27.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com			{interval=30,target=TCP:80,timeout=5,healthy-threshold=3,unhealthy-threshold=3}	black-dollar	subnet-7df6395c	vpc-5d4e2217		{protocol=HTTP,lb-port=80,instance-port=80}				{owner-alias=000441287616,group-name=default}	{sg-b50fa8c3}	2016-07-13T05:02:05.712Z	internal
{code}
# Attempted to hit port 80 on internal ELB:
{code}
[root@g-05-06 ~]# telnet internal-DBIntern-LoadBalan-LX4OBPVWGWNHS-000441287616.lb.a-27.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com 80
Trying 192.168.50.219...
telnet: connect to address 192.168.50.219: No route to host
{code}
